info.name: Simple Soundcloud flat dark theme
info.description: A simple dark flat theme for soundcloud.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme is inspired of the color scheme of the style "Dark Flat Minimal Firefox [meh:blast]" => https://userstyles.org/styles/129567/dark-flat-minimal-firefox-meh-blast

The source code is poorly optimized, I accept any kind of idea! ;)

Versions:

- v0.0.5 (2018-09-15) ~ Change licence and quick fix
- v0.0.4 (2016-12-04) ~ set color
- v0.0.3 (2016-10-30) ~ Set the correct theme scheme in search page & fix some other graphical mistakes
- V0.0.2 (2016-10-29) ~ Fix some graphical mistakes
- V0.0.1 (2016-10-27) ~ Initial Release
